history.title: Our History
history.description: Ensias NeuroDynamics Club is the result of the fusion of two prominent Ensias Clubs which are: Ensias AI Club and Ensias Robotics Club

cells.title: Our Cells
cells.description: The NeuroDynamics club is organized into specialized cells, each focusing on different aspects of AI and robotics.

technical.name: AI Cell
technical.description: Organizes and delivers workshops and training sessions on artificial intelligence and machine learning.

technical.name: Data Cell
technical.description: Conducts workshops and training sessions focused on data-oriented roles and methodologies.

technical.name: Robotics Cell
technical.description: Hosts workshops and training sessions dedicated to robotics.

technical.name: Projects Cell
technical.description: Develops projects that integrate both artificial intelligence and robotics.

nonTechnical.name: Media Cell
nonTechnical.description: Responsible for documenting and promoting all club events, including filming, editing, and enhancing the club's public image and reach.

nonTechnical.name: Sponsorship Cell
nonTechnical.description: Focuses on securing partnerships and sponsorships to support the club's initiatives and events.

nonTechnical.name: Events Cell
nonTechnical.description: Oversees event planning and execution, managing logistics, coordinating with guest speakers, and facilitating competitions.

nonTechnical.name: Design Cell
nonTechnical.description: Handles the visual identity of the club by creating banners, logos, promotional materials, and other design elements, ensuring artistic direction for events.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.subtitle: Learn, Build, Innovate!
activities.description: At NeuroDynamics Club, we thrive on hands-on learning, collaboration, and real-world impact! Our activities are designed to push the boundaries of AI and robotics while fostering creativity and teamwork.

categories.title: External Events
categories.description: We proudly represent our club in major tech and science gatherings, including the Rabat Science Festival, where we showcase our innovations to a wider audience.

categories.title: Internal Activities
categories.description: From training sessions and workshops to collaborative projects, we provide the perfect space to experiment, build, and grow. Whether you're learning new frameworks or developing cutting-edge robotic solutions, there's always something exciting happening!

training.title: Explore Our Training Sessions
training.description: Dive into our specialized training programs designed to equip you with cutting-edge skills in AI, Data Science, and Robotics.

sessions.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
sessions.description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning algorithms and applications.

sessions.title: Deep Learning with PyTorch
sessions.description: Build neural networks and implement deep learning models using PyTorch.

sessions.title: Natural Language Processing
sessions.description: Explore techniques for processing and analyzing human language data.

sessions.title: Data Analysis with Python
sessions.description: Master data manipulation, visualization, and analysis using Python libraries.

sessions.title: Big Data Processing
sessions.description: Learn to process and analyze large datasets using distributed computing frameworks.

sessions.title: Data Engineering Pipeline
sessions.description: Build robust data pipelines for collecting, processing, and storing data.

sessions.title: Introduction to Robotics
sessions.description: Understand the basics of robotics, sensors, and actuators.

sessions.title: Robot Programming with ROS
sessions.description: Program robots using the Robot Operating System (ROS) framework.

sessions.title: Autonomous Navigation
sessions.description: Implement algorithms for robot localization, mapping, and path planning.

mainEvent.title: MARC Hackathon 2025
mainEvent.subtitle: Innovate for Impact!
mainEvent.description: Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI and robotics? Join MARC Hackathon 2025, where innovators come together to build AI-driven robotic solutions that enhance accessibility and empower individuals with disabilities!
mainEvent.theme: AI and Robots in Human's Service
mainEvent.tagline: Build the future. Make a difference.
